data.message: how can I make sure the video uploaded through the facebook app gets posted as high definition? The quality I recorded in is HD but the final quality is horrible. None of my uploaded videos have the intended quality and are images barely recognizable with zero detail.

replies.message: Great question, Michael. You can find tips for uploading high quality videos to Facebook in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1LURGwx. Thanks for reaching out! -Anna
